snippet: Without being specific, the Republican nominee departs from his pugilistic nature to offer an apology for his statements that have “caused personal pain.”...
abstract: Donald Trump, during rally in Charlotte, NC, expresses contrition for making statements that have 'caused personal pain,' in rare admission of culpability; fails to offer specific apologies.
lead_paragraph: Without being specific, the Republican nominee departs from his pugilistic nature to offer an apology for his statements that have “caused personal pain.”

headline.main: Donald Trump Steps Out of Character to Voice Unexplained Regrets
headline.print_headline: Trump Steps Out of Character to Voice Unexplained Regrets
